description: This JSON Schema describes the entire acquisition process during an SEM_FIB_Tomography measurement.  The acquisition comprises of multiple datasets which are described using the schema located at https://github.com/kit-data-manager/Metadata-Schemas-for-Materials-Science/blob/main/SEM-FIB%20Tomography/SEM_FIB_Tomography_acquisition_Dataset_Schema.json. The images in each dataset is taken using a detector (SE, BSE, EDS, EBSD) using a specific configuration. Each image is described by the schema located at https://github.com/kit-data-manager/Metadata-Schemas-for-Materials-Science/blob/main/SEM-FIB%20Tomography/SEM_FIB_Tomography_acquisition_Image_Schema.json. The units are by default to be considred as the SI units unless otherwise specified
title: acquisition_main

acquisition.description: The entry level is the root element of the schema. It contains all the metadata describing an acquisition as part of an SEM/FIB Tomography measurement which might include multiple detectors.

genericMetadata.description: Describes all the generic metadata common to the acquisition

program.description: (Optional)- Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition

applicationID.description: (Optional)- Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition

fileVersion.description: The file version of the measurement data of the project

projectName.description: The name of the project containing the acquistion datasets

zCutSpacing.description: The spacing between individual slices in z dimension

numberOfCuts.description: The number of slices into which the sample is cut during the course of the SEM/FIB Tomography

pump.description: The name of the pump used in the instrument

column.description: The name of the column used in the instrument

source.description: The type of the source used in the instrument. The source is a physical part of an electron or ion microscope from which the particles that form the beam are emitted. IRI: https://iris.hmc-services.de/EM_Glossary/term_00000013

eucentricWorkingDistance.description: The Working Distance when the smaple is at the eucentric height

ESEM.description: To be set to true if environmental SEM is used

systemType.description: Describes the system type used - the name of the instrument

stage.description: The dimensions of the stage used in the instrument

genericMetadata.title: genericMetadata

dataset.description: Array of all the dataset-metadata acquired using multiple detetors

program.description: (Optional) - Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition.

programName.description: (Optional) - Name of the program (or software) used for acquisition

program.title: program

identifierValue.description: (Optional) - String containing the value of an identifier

identifierType.description: (Optional) - Type of the identifier to be selected from: *ROR *GRID *ISNI *URL *DOI *Handle *String

distanceDetails.description: (Optional) - Describes a distance, size or length.

value.description: (Required) - Value of the distance, size or length

unit.description: (Optional) - Unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (nm, Âµm, mm, cm, m, default value - mm)

qualifier.description: (Optional) - Qualifier to describe the value (e.g., average, maximum, minimum, default value - max)

distanceDetails.title: distanceDetails
